# Herald (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* | Barachiel |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] is a class skill. You gain a +4 sacred bonus on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] and [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks.

**Herald Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|Comprehend Languages]]****:**Understand all spoken and written languages.

**2** **[[Enthrall (Spell)|Enthrall]]****:** Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

**3** **[[Tongues (Spell)|Tongues]]****:** Speak any language.

**4** **[[Sending (Spell)|Sending]]****:** Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

**5 Command, Greater:** As *[[Command (Spell)|command]]*, but affects one subject/level.

**6** **[[Dream (Spell)|Dream]]****:** Sends message to anyone sleeping.

**7** **[[Aspect of the Deity (Spell)|Aspect of the Deity]]****:** As *[[Aspect of the Deity, Lesser (Spell)|lesser aspect of the deity]]*, but you get celestial qualities.

**8 [[Crown of Glory (Spell)|Crown of Glory]] <sup>M</sup>:** Aura inspires awe.

**9** **[[Aspect of the Deity, Greater (Spell)|Greater Aspect of the Deity]]****:** As *[[Aspect of the Deity, Lesser (Spell)|lesser aspect of the deity]]*, but gain wings, enhanced ability scores, 

     and various resistances and immunities.

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 87
